mutants.code:
from collections import Counter
import re

def letter_frequency(text):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('', '', text.lower())
    letter_count = Counter(cleaned_text)
    sorted_letter_count = dict(sorted(letter_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True))
    return sorted_letter_count

from collections import Counter
import re

def letter_frequency(text):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]', 'MUTATED', text.lower())
    letter_count = Counter(cleaned_text)
    sorted_letter_count = dict(sorted(letter_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True))
    return sorted_letter_count

mutants.code:
from collections import Counter
import re

def letter_frequency(text):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]', '', text.lower())
    letter_count = Counter(cleaned_text)
    sorted_letter_count = dict(sorted(letter_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True))
    return sorted_letter_count
